alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, northeastern Gwinnett, southern Hall and northwestern Jackson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Chestnut Mountain, or 9 miles south of Gainesville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Sugar Hill, Buford, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Talmo, Rest Haven, Candler, Thompsons Mill, Chateau Elan, Aqualand Park, Chestnut Mountain, Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway, Lake Lanier Islands, Hog Mountain and County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
